reviewText: My grandsons fell in love with this movie
This is a great family show...........perfect for kids who like dogs, cats and special effects!

Roborex is a fun movie geared toward kids.  It is a sci fi film about a boy whose mother is missing.  He has a dog named Rex.  He gets visited by robots from the future who come to alter/protect the future they know.  One is Roborex and the other is DestructoCat.

The acting is really pretty good, especially the two child stars: Kalvin Stinger and Maggie Scott,  Ben Browder of SG-1 and Farscape is good as the boy's father.  Ethan Philips makes a good and funny mad scientist.

The special effects are better than I expected.

The filming is nicely done.

The plot is consistent and plays out well.

Overall a good and very family-friendly movie.  Not just for children.  I enjoyed it and like a more lighthearted approach to sci fi.
Very cute, family friendly film. Kids ages 6, 5, and 3 loved it.
no closed caption so I cannot enjoy, I am deaf and the closed caption is a must
My 3 year old son loves this movie!
Great condition and my child loves it!
My 8 year old son loves this movie!! Now he wants to build a robot for himself. Boring after watching 10 times for an adult though! lol
My kids (8 and 10) really enjoyed it.

My 3 year old watches it over and over again.
I ordered the newer one but it came damaged (would not plan)
I re-ordered the newer one and am hoping for the best
I bought this because Ben Browder was in it and it turned out to be a cute movie that I could watch with my 5 year old grand daughter. Love Ben.

I did not watch, but it kept the attention of four 8 year old girls and they were really excited about it.  Perhaps not for younger kiddos, as the real life dog dies at the end, but comes back as a robot dog.
Great family movie, bought for 6 year old grandson, he really enjoys this movie.
